item.title: 芝加哥所有校董将在预算混乱中辞职
item.description: 芝加哥市教育委员会的七名成员将于本月晚些时候全部卸任，这将结束几个月来芝加哥市与学区之间不断升级的紧张关系，因为双方都面临着巨额赤字。【原文：All seven Chicago Board of Education members will step down later this month, capping months of escalating tensions between the city and its school district as both face big deficits.】

item.title: 加拿大养老金聘请施罗德的 Sophie van Oosterom 领导房地产业务
item.description: 加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）聘请索菲-范-奥斯特罗姆（Sophie van Oosterom）担任房地产部主管，熟悉内情的人士称，这位施罗德集团（Schroders Plc）的高管将负责管理一个近来回报微薄的投资组合。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board hired Sophie van Oosterom as head of real estate, people familiar with the matter said, tapping the Schroders Plc executive to run a portfolio that has earned meager returns of late.】

item.title: 意大利电信董事会授权首席执行官讨论 Sparkle 收购事宜
item.description: 意大利电信公司（Telecom Italia SpA）首席执行官皮埃特罗-拉布里奥拉（Pietro Labriola）已获得公司董事会授权，就其海底光缆部门 7 亿欧元（7.67 亿美元）的非约束性竞购进行谈判。【原文：Telecom Italia SpA Chief Executive Officer Pietro Labriola has been authorized by the company’s board of directors to negotiate a €700 million ($767 million) non-binding bid for its submarine cable unit.】

item.title: 橡树树支持的 STG 达成债务协议，颠覆债权人地位
item.description: 据知情人士透露，橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）支持的 STG 物流公司与一组贷款人达成了一项协议，对其债务堆栈进行了全面调整，允许他们在还款优先权方面领先于同行。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management-backed STG Logistics reached a deal with a group of lenders that overhauls its debt stack and allows them to jump ahead of peers in the repayment priority line, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Tempur Sealy 为收购床垫公司出售 16 亿美元贷款
item.description: 以富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）为首的一批银行周五出售了一笔 16 亿美元的杠杆贷款，以资助 Tempur Sealy International Inc.【原文：A group of banks led by Wells Fargo & Co. sold a $1.6 billion leveraged loan Friday to help fund Tempur Sealy International Inc.’s proposed acquisition of Mattress Firm Group Inc. that the Federal Trade Commission is seeking to block.】

item.title: 卡彭特声称他在特斯拉上赚了 3.06 亿美元，然后血本无归
item.description: 来自加拿大温哥华岛的木匠克里斯托弗-德沃奇特（Christopher DeVocht）说，他一开始和很多日内交易者一样。下班后，他在论坛上阅读有关交易的信息。他最喜欢交易的是特斯拉公司股票的期权。【原文：Christopher DeVocht, a carpenter from Vancouver Island, Canada, says he started out like a lot of day traders. After work, he’d read about trading on forums. His favorite things to trade were options on Tesla Inc. stock.】

item.title: 强劲就业报告减轻美联储下次会议压力
item.description: 9 月份出人意料的强劲招聘减少了人们对美国劳动力市场的担忧，从而减轻了美联储的压力，使政策制定者有余地在未来几个月以更渐进的步伐继续降息。【原文：Surprisingly strong hiring in September has taken pressure off the Federal Reserve by reducing worries over the US labor market, giving policymakers room to continue cutting interest rates at a more gradual pace in coming months.】

item.title: 奇货通讯：货币市场会把你搞得一团糟
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读《奇货》周刊，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and the economy.】

item.title: 科斯拉表示，尽管有人离职，但 OpenAI 的团队依然强大
item.description: 人工智能初创公司OpenAI的早期投资人维诺德-科斯拉（Vinod Khosla）表示，尽管最近有不少人离职，但OpenAI仍拥有一支非常强大的技术团队。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup OpenAI has a strong, very technical team in place despite the number of recent departures, said Vinod Khosla, an early investor in the company.】

item.title: DSV 募资据称将吸引 300 亿美元投资者订单
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，DSV A/S 周四的股票销售吸引了超过 300 亿美元的订单，因为对这笔交易的需求超过了发售股票数量的五倍多。【原文：DSV A/S’s share sale on Thursday drew in excess of $30 billion in orders as demand for the deal surpassed the number of shares on offer by more than five times, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Planet Fitness 运营商考虑利用私人债务为贷款再融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Planet Fitness 健身房的最大运营商 United FP 正在与私人信贷机构洽谈 7.5 亿美元的一揽子债务，以帮助到期的杠杆贷款再融资。【原文：The largest operator of Planet Fitness gyms, United FP, is in talks with private credit lenders for a $750 million debt package to help refinance a maturing leveraged loan, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 以 17 亿美元收购 SilverCrest 交易达成后，Coeur 股价下跌
item.description: 贵金属矿业公司 Coeur Mining Inc. 在银价飙升之际宣布以 17 亿美元的价格收购 SilverCrest Metals Inc.【原文：Shares of precious metals miner Coeur Mining Inc. tumbled after the company said it entered a deal to acquire SilverCrest Metals Inc. for a value of $1.7 billion at a time when silver prices have been surging.】

item.title: 赛诺菲医疗保健公司竞标者因滑石粉问题修改报价
item.description: 据知情人士透露，赛诺菲消费者保健部门的竞购者正在修改他们的报价，部分原因是担心与一个销售滑石粉的品牌有关的潜在责任。【原文：Bidders for Sanofi’s consumer healthcare unit are revising their offers in part to address concerns around potential liabilities related to a brand that sold talcum powder, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.description: 在德克萨斯州的郊区，离休斯顿市中心 40 英里的地方计划建造一个拥有露天剧场、舞厅和山羊养殖场的社区；这为市政债券投资者提供了一个在美国发展最快的地区下注的窗口。【原文：In suburban Texas, a neighborhood complete with an amphitheater, dance hall and goat farm is scheduled to be erected 40 miles from Houston’s downtown — providing municipal-bond investors a window to bet on one of the fastest-growing areas of the US.】

item.title: 拉里-萨默斯称 9 月降息 50 个基点是个 "错误
item.description: 前财政部长拉里-萨默斯（Larry Summers）表示，美联储上个月的降息决定是一个错误，因为新数据显示美国上个月的就业增长超过了所有预期。【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Larry Summers said the Federal Reserve’s decision to cut interest rates last month was a mistake after new data showed that US job growth last month topped all estimates.】

item.title: 摩根大通和美国银行不再认为美联储会在 11 月降息半点
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）和美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）目前预测，美联储将在11月举行下次会议时将利率下调四分之一个点，在劳动力市场数据提供了美国经济韧性的证据之后，他们放弃了更大幅度降息的呼吁。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Bank of America Corp. are now forecasting a quarter-point reduction in interest rates when the Federal Reserve next meets in November, giving up on their calls for a larger cut after labor-market data offered evidence of US economic resilience.】

item.title: 德国 Autodoc 要求银行参与新一轮 IPO 计划
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，德国在线汽车零部件经销商 Autodoc 已要求银行为其在法兰克福的潜在首次公开募股提供角色，这距离该公司上一次上市尝试已有大约三年时间。【原文：German online car-parts dealer Autodoc has asked banks to pitch for roles on a potential initial public offering in Frankfurt, roughly three years after its previous listing attempt, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 原糖溢价因预期巴西出口疲软而扩大
item.description: 本周，两个最活跃的原糖期货合约之间的主要价差扩大，原因是全球第一大原糖供应国巴西的出口预期放缓，短期内市场供应紧张。【原文：A key spread between the two most-active raw sugar futures contracts widened this week as an expected slowdown in exports from the world’s top supplier Brazil is seen keeping markets tight in the short term.】

item.title: 南非 19 亿美元柑橘出口面临新病害威胁
item.description: 南非的柑橘出口产业价值 19 亿美元，是世界上仅次于西班牙的最大出口产业，但在与欧盟就真菌感染问题持续存在争议的情况下，该产业面临着新的疾病威胁。【原文：South Africa’s $1.9 billion citrus-export industry, the world’s biggest after Spain, faces a new disease threat amid an ongoing dispute with the European Union over fungal infections.】

item.title: 铜冶炼厂警告说，随着紧缩谈判的展开，他们将面临关闭的危险
item.description: 铜冶炼厂警告说，如果该行业的加工费降幅过大，工厂可能会停产甚至倒闭，因为与主要矿商的年度供应谈判本周即将开始。【原文：Copper smelters are warning that plants may shut down or even go out of business if the industry’s processing fees drop too sharply, as annual supply negotiations with key miners get underway this week.】

item.title: 释放罗斯特朗普为何希望罗斯-乌尔布里希特获释出狱
item.description: 如果唐纳德-特朗普在 11 月的美国总统大选中获胜，他将向加密货币社区做出一系列承诺，其中包括承诺为黑暗网络市场 "丝绸之路"（Silk Road）的创始人罗斯-乌尔布里奇特（Ross Ulbricht）减刑。【原文：Donald Trump has made a raft of promises to the crypto community should he win the US presidential election in November, including a pledge to commute the sentence of Ross Ulbricht, the founder of dark-web marketplace Silk Road.】

item.title: 摩托罗拉早已弃用传呼机，业务却蒸蒸日上
item.description: 摩托罗拉曾是手机和职业橄榄球教练使用的笨重耳机的代名词，上个月该公司在社交媒体上被指控制造了在黎巴嫩爆炸的传呼机，从而成为头条新闻。【原文：Motorola, a brand name once synonymous with mobile phones and bulky headsets used by pro football coaches, made headlines last month when the company was accused on social media of making the pagers that exploded in Lebanon.】
